project.description: The World Flora aims to create a global online resource for all plants. It will provide a focus for taxonomists working on plants and will help people discover information about plants by providing tools for identification, up-to-date checklists, descriptions and links to other resources.
project.name: World Flora

developer.name: Ben Clark
developer.organization: Department of Zoology, University of Oxford

developer.organization: Science Applications, IT Department, Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
